distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for openvpn fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-0547: Fixed possible authentication bypass in external authentication plug-in (bsc#1197341).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: OpenVPN 2.1 until v2.4.12 and v2.5.6 may enable authentication bypass in external authentication plug-ins when more than one of them makes use of deferred authentication replies, which allows an external user to be granted access with only partially correct credentials.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
